Class DetectorImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DetectorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Detector, Device, Storable, VehicleSampler
public class DetectorImpl extends DeviceImpl implements Detector, VehicleSampler
Detector for traffic data sampling
Author:
Douglas Lau

      Log a vehicle detection event.

      duration - Event duration in milliseconds.
      headway - Headway since last event in milliseconds.
      stamp - Timestamp of detection event.
      speed - Speed in miles per hour.
      length - Length in feet.
